description: The 7 fundamental building blocks - first principles that govern every business problem
overview: Every business challenge is physics. Forces trying to move through constraints. These 7 particles are the atomic elements that combine into all business patterns. Understanding them lets you see what's actually happening beneath surface symptoms.

time.summary: The window narrows. Momentum builds or dies. Opportunity decays. The universal constraint.
time.when_relevant: Deadlines, urgency, timing decisions, opportunity windows, momentum questions

actors.summary: Who can say yes. Who can say no. Who just gets affected. The people with power and impact.
actors.when_relevant: Stakeholder questions, decision-making authority, organizational dynamics

resources.summary: What you have to work with. Energy, money, attention, people, materials. Never enough of what matters.
resources.when_relevant: Budget constraints, capacity planning, resource allocation, what's possible given what exists

objectives.summary: What everyone's actually after. Surprisingly identical across industries once you strip away jargon.
objectives.when_relevant: Goal clarity, motivation understanding, what success looks like, what people really want

constraints.summary: The edges of possibility. Physics, budgets, regulations, human nature. What you can't change.
constraints.when_relevant: Limitations, boundaries, what's non-negotiable, immovable forces

information.summary: What you know, what they know, what nobody knows yet. Asymmetries create opportunity and risk.
information.when_relevant: Knowledge gaps, market intelligence, competitive advantage, uncertainty

incentives.summary: What people say drives them. What actually drives them. The invisible force behind all behavior.
incentives.when_relevant: Behavior design, motivation, why things happen despite plans, alignment questions

usage_note: These combine into molecules (larger patterns). Rarely examine particles alone - use them to decompose complex problems into understandable components.
